channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- CP Image Store with Slideshow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- CP Image Store with Slideshow

item.title: CVE-2022-1692|2024-08-03T00:10:03.848Z -- unknown -- cp%20image%20store%20with%20slideshow
item.description: The CP Image Store with Slideshow WordPress plugin before 1.0.68 does not sanitise and escape the ordering_by query parameter before using it in a SQL statement in pages where the [codepeople-image-store] is embed, allowing unauthenticated users to perform an SQL injection attack
